title: eWeatherHD,Radar,Alert,Eclipse v5.5.8
description:
A lunar eclipse will take place on 4 April 2015. Eclipse will visible in Asia and America only. Do not miss. See time of the start in your city with our app.

This is the first app in the world with radar, hurricane tracking, earthquakes and alerts widgets.

For those who want to know everything about the weather conditions and alerts both for today and the next 10 days, the past 365 days, hurricanes, tornadoes, hurricanes, earthquakes, geomagnetic storms.

App has twenty original widgets of the weather, radar, earthquakes, alerts, moon phase, barometer, geomagnetic index, UV index, rain and snow amount etc.

Annual archives of air temperature and sea for any city in the world allows you to choose the good time and place for the travel. You can compare the weather in the current year with the weather in the last year. Also you can always have your own opinion about the statements that has never was so cold, hot, wet, dry.

Features:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Two world-renowned weather providers: Foreca and US weather provider,

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Hurricane tracking,
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 365 days weathre archive,

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Barometer with headache indicator,

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Cloud satellite layer on map (USA, Europe, Japan and Australia),
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 130,000 locations all over the world,

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Widgets for lockscreen was added (only for Android 4.2)

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Ten day forecast,

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Earthquakes widget on OpenStreetMap,

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Black ice and freeze warnings,

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Moon phase, moon rise and moon set times,
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Sunrise and sunset times,

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Geomagnetic storm forecast,
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Wind speed and directionality indicators in both 10-day and hour-by-hour forecasts (except Foreca),
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 24 hour by hour forecast,
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Current weather conditions,
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Only uses 10 KBytes of internet traffic per city for each weather update,
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ World clock,
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ METAR from weather station (except Foreca),
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ UV index,

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Precipitation probability,

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Follow by location (uses GPS or Cell Network location determination),
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Full tablet support,
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Share forecast, alerts, earthquakes by e-mail and SMS
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Alarm clock time on clock dial and graph

What's New:

- Hurricane tracking
- Alarm clock time on clock dial and graph
- Weather archive for month
- Weather alert categories with different sounds and silent mode at night
- Send weather alerts by SMS
- Solstice, Equinox, Polar night, Polar day, Solar eclipse, Lunar eclipse
- Backup and restore app settings
- New 10-day graph modes
- Time to sunrise or sunset
- Wind gust
- Click on yellow and blue points for display sunset, sunrise and day length
- Inverse rotation of the seconds hand for joke
